morningBrief.headline: 3" Freshened Things Up
morningBrief.body: 3" of new snow. Not a powder day, but definitely an upgrade. 1 new trail opened today. Light snow possible in the forecast.

recommendations: Fresh corduroy on Keno - all skill levels
Fresh corduroy on Perseverance - all skill levels
Fresh corduroy on Star - all skill levels

morningBrief.headline: Fresh Coat on the Mountain
morningBrief.body: A light refresh of 2" overnight makes the groomers smoother. The forecast is flirting with us: light snow expected. Not a dump, but welcome.

morningBrief.headline: Overnight Refresh
morningBrief.body: The mountain got a nice 1" touch-up. Expect improved conditions. Peak terrain status: almost everything is available today. The forecast is flirting with us: light snow expected. Not a dump, but welcome.

morningBrief.headline: The Whole Mountain Awaits
morningBrief.body: Steady snowfall with 6" over the last week. The whole mountain is basically open. Go explore. Light snow possible in the forecast.

morningBrief.headline: The Forecast Looks Loaded
morningBrief.body: 1" fell while you were sleeping. The bumps are softer, groomers are primo. Big things coming. 6" in the forecast. Might be time to plan ahead.

morningBrief.headline: Winter's Coming Back
morningBrief.body: 1" fell while you were sleeping. The bumps are softer, groomers are primo. The weather models are locked in: 8" of snow heading our way.

morningBrief.headline: Major System Approaching
morningBrief.body: The mountain got a nice 1" touch-up. Expect improved conditions. Nearly full mountain access with 85 of 85 trails spinning. The weather models are locked in: 8" of snow heading our way.

morningBrief.headline: Major System Approaching
morningBrief.body: Steady snowfall with 6" over the last week. A significant storm is brewing with 8" expected over the next few days.

morningBrief.headline: Nearly Everything Open
morningBrief.body: The rundown: 116 trails open, 43 groomed. Unknown with temps around 28.4. Nearly full mountain access with 116 of 120 trails spinning.

morningBrief.headline: Mother Nature Can't Decide
morningBrief.body: 166/170 trails spinning, 32 freshly groomed. 32 and Cloud/Sun/Mixed. The whole mountain is basically open. Go explore. Transition weather: rain turning to snow as you climb. Variable conditions throughout.

morningBrief.headline: Mountain Conditions Update
morningBrief.body: 58 trails open, 30 groomed. Unknown, high of 26.6. 58/81 trails open, 30 groomed. 26.6 and Unknown.

recommendations: Fresh corduroy on Haychute - expert terrain only
